titles.title: Spaceport Equality Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat spaceports like airports under the exempt facility bond rules.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5932-5933)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

reference.label: text of measure as introduced in Senate

bill.summary:
5/10/2007--Introduced.
Spaceport Equality Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt facility bonds for spaceports.
